main event: An unidentified aerial object was reported over San Antonio, Texas, on 28 July 1952, observed by multiple control tower personnel and a fighter interceptor crew.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 30 feet in diameter and cigar-shaped,The sighting was corroborated by radar tracking and visual observation over a sustained period,Multiple witnesses confirmed the object's appearance and behavior,The incident led to a formal report being filed with Project Blue Book for further investigation,No physical evidence or photographs were collected during the sightings.
witness description: control tower officers and fighter interceptor crew members
